title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 128.3 - Movement of regulated articles within the quarantine area
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 128.3 - Movement of regulated articles within the quarantine area

State Regulations
A regulated article may be moved freely within the
quarantine area, provided the regulated article is otherwise eligible for
unrestricted movement under all other state plant quarantines and regulations
applicable to the regulated article. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
128.3

Amended

New

York State Register August 25, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 34, eff. 8/25/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
